title: Your Favorite Champion Has to Help You Survive a Zombie Invasion
body:
Will you survive or die?

{{champion:432}} Well I don't think Zombies can take magical Journeys also infinite traveling and gathering meeps.

replies.body: *Oranges

{{champion:223}} 
I can hide inside him whenever need be and he can literally take me anywhere in the universe, apparently.
for a price >;)
{{champion:78}} The zombies run from _you_.
{{champion:14}} I don't know. Could go both ways. Either he's an unstoppable zombie-slaying machine, or he'd make an unstoppable zombie.
Well, considering he is a zombie, he's kinda both. Good thing he's on your side!

So, uh... you got anything to help us get outta this mess?

{{champion:33}} *Curls inside shell* "Ok."

Crap.

{{champion:268}} 

I guess we have our own sand army to combat the army of undead. Shurima!

{{champion:10}}.  We have unlimited supplies of healing, invulnerability, and holy fire, from a master swordswoman in artifact armor who also flies and can't get infected because she's immune to disease?  Well.  That just takes all the sport out of it.  I think my biggest concern is going to be finding ways to beat boredom, not zombies.

{{champion:44}}
Me: I know I've been bit-
{{champion:44}}: Imbune
Me: Wow, I feel great, my wounds gone, the infection is removed, and I feel strangely erected.
{{champion:44}} **Victory**
Unless zombies are immune to fire....{{champion:1}}
just climb up on his head, zombies can't reach you if he's stomping all of them into paste :p
{{champion:103}}  atleast ill die happy
{{champion:14}} He **IS** the Zombie Invasion

{{champion:223}} 
Ew gross tahm don't eat that it's rotten

with {{champion:201}} plowing down zombies i'm safe 
{{champion:16}} will probably cure the Zombies so i'm fine 
{{champion:45}} he basically just destroys all the zombies 
{{champion:38}} will teleport me away from harm so im safe
overall im pretty much safe no matter who i pick

{{champion:222}} 
Already has a trigger finger. I could be good as look as I stay on her good side.

{{champion:80}}
Whelp I'm pretty much zombie food.  He can only kill so many before we get overrun.
{{champion:222}} Well...she has a things for guns...So i think im kay

Dare I say ...{{summoner:14}} {{champion:17}} {{summoner:14}} ? Never ever gonna play him.... EVER! but i believe my survive ability (its 2 words?) would be unmatched. #Shrooms around the house...

but if it were my favorite champion, Id still be ok cause{{summoner:11}} {{champion:107}} {{summoner:11}} we just go all Predator vs Zombie on them and we can cuddle with fluffy kitty

After thought: Heimerdinger cause Turrets....

{{champion:122}} 

As long as I'm not near him when he's swinging that axe...
{{champion:61}} Shes immune and i guess could kill them with Gears and Ball...itd be close...
{{champion:82}}..... at least we enjoy the same music, and he is the first undead, we could probably get along and if I die he will probably ult me
{{champion:74}} He has the technology!
With {{champion:8}} around, I think I'll be okay.
{{champion:102}} She's fine, I'm gonna die.
{{champion:134}} Unless Zombies'll learn how to fly. Until then... YUSS!

{{champion:31}}  As long as he decides not to eat me, we are good I think. AOE seems useful against zombies, he can take a bunch of hits, and I can ride on top of him with a machine gun. Actually, I really like this set up, I just have to not get eaten by cho, and no zombies can touch me.
{{champion:157}} So, do I win life?
{{champion:1}} BURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRNNNNNNNNNNNN AHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA **cough** sorry got a little carried away with this one

{{champion:83}} ...

Son of a b***h!

The people that main Lucian are kind of OK, I guess

I don't think zombies are fond of sunlight, so Leona would save me quite thoroughly.
{{champion:203}} ...I'm good.
{{champion:21}} Grab a ship and **get the fuck outta there!**
{{champion:157}}  I think I'm fine.

{{champion:62}} decoys to evade the horde, bash single zombie targets in the head with his staff and when all else fails, SPIN TO WIN. I would say I'll survive as long as we use his decoys strategically.
{{champion:421}} Tunnel travel OP, Zombies can't kill me if I'm underground. That and she's definitely immune to zombie-ism, so she can just destroy all the waves of zombies.
I got kindred {{champion:203}}  since her ult prevents me from dying I will enjoy the view and maybe play cards with her and wolf
I'll just make Yasuo carry me around with his infinite dashes. {{champion:157}}
{{champion:266}} .... soooo a zombie fighting zombies
{{champion:103}} Piggy back ride! Wooh! It's a good thing im not heavy..

{{champion:60}} 

1/ Hot grill ( maybe she will kill me after sexual intercourse but....#worth )
2/ spider vs zombie
3/ she can share her "medicine" with me :D I will become immortal

idk...50/50?
